item.description:
Olá,

The feijoada is taken care of so we ask that everyone else either bring something extra to eat or drink (think appetizers, beer, desert, etc.) or money to contribute to expenses.  If you have any questions or concerns then either post them below or send me an email at BcRomas@gmail.com.

The lunch will be hosted by Kata - her address is:

10 Homer Square #2

Somerville, MA 02143

Anyone with a good collection of Brazilian music on CD or ipod should bring it!

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Have a cookout/churasco
